Company: 24 Shopping Co., Ltd. by CP ALL
Description:
รายละเอียด
1. รับแจ้งเรื่องปัญหาการใช้งานของระบบต่างๆใน บริษัท และทำการวิเคราะห์และแก้ปัญหาเบื้องต้นก่อนที่จะทำการแจ้งหน่วยงานที่ดูแลระบบโดยตรงเข้ามาจัดการแก้ไขปัญหาถ้าไม่สามารถแก้ไขได้
2. ติดตามการแก้ไขปัญหาแต่ล่ะเคสตาม severity ที่กำหนด โดยควบคุมการแก้ไขปัญหาโดยไม่ให้เกิน sla( service level agreement ) ที่ได้กำหนดไว้ของแต่ล่ะ severity
3. งานด้าน co-ordinator : เป็นตัวกลางในการติดต่อระหว่างระบบสารสนเทศกับกลุ่มผู้เกี่ยวข้องได้แก่เจ้าของระบบ (system owners) ผู้ใช้ระบบ (system users) และผู้สร้างระบบ (system builders) เพื่อประสานงานในการแก้ไขปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นได้อย่างถูกต้องและรวดเร็ว
4. เป็นผู้ที่คอยดูแล ให้คำแนะนำ ควบคุม และติดตามผลการทำงานของ user ให้ตรงกับระบบที่ได้วางไว้ เพื่อไม่ให้เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการใช้งานของระบบ
5. จัดทำรายงานสรุปการเปิด incident และ วิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นเพื่อหา solution ในการแก้ไขปัญหาระยะยาวเพื่อป้องกันไม่ให้เกิดขึ้นซ้ำ
6. ควบคุม ดูแลมาตรฐานการใช้เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ ให้เป็นไปในแนวทางเดียวกับนโยบายการดำเนินงานของบริษัทกำหนด มาตรฐานงานของระบบคอมพิวเตอร์ทั้งหมด อาทิ ฮาร์ดแวร์ ซอฟท์แวร์ และระบบเครือข่าย ฯลฯ ให้เหมาะสมกับการดำเนินธุรกิจของบริษัท
7. รับแจ้งเรื่องปัญหาการใช้งานของระบบต่างๆ และทำการวิเคราะห์และแก้ปัญหาเบื้องต้นก่อนที่จะทำการแจ้งหน่วยงานที่ดูแลระบบโดยตรงเข้ามาจัดการแก้ไขปัญหาถ้าไม่สามารถแก้ไขได้

รายละเอียดงาน
จัดทำแผนงานโครงการ กำหนดรูปแบบการดำเนินโครงการ ควบคุมติดตามความคืบหน้าและบริหารโครงการเพื่อให้ส่งมอบงานได้ตรงตามกำหนดระยะเวลาและเงื่อนไขข้อกำหนดที่ระบุในเอกสารสัญญาและ / หรือ เอกสาร proposal (role and responsibility, term of payment, scope of work, schedule,  และ man-day
จัดสรรและวางแผนทรัพยากรในทีมให้สามารถปฏิบัติงานเพื่อให้โครงการสำเร็จตามแผนงานและส่งมอบงานได้ตรงตามกำหนดระยะเวลาและเงื่อนไขข้อกำหนดที่ระบุในเอกสารสัญญา
กำหนดแผน กระบวนการและดำเนินการทดสอบระบบงานภายใน (internal test) ก่อนการส่งมอบระบบงานให้ลูกค้าทดสอบก่อนทุกครั้ง
จัดการปัญหาและวิเคราะห์ความเสี่ยงที่จะเกิดขึ้นกับโครงการ
วิเคราะห์ปัญหา ให้คำปรึกษากับหน่วยงานต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง ทั้งในด้านเทคนิค และการบริการ
ติดตามประสานงานกับลูกค้า สร้างความสัมพันธ์ที่ดีให้ลูกค้าพึงพอใจในการให้บริการ

job responsibilities
visa and work permit management:
handle all aspects of the visas and work permit process for expatriate employees, including applications, renewals, cancellations and 90-day report.
ensure compliance with local immigration laws and regulations.
coordinate with government agencies, embassies, and legal counsel to facilitate the smooth processing of visas and work permits.
maintain accurate records and monitoring the deadline of visa and work permit status for all expatriate employees.
provide guidance and support to expatriates on immigration-related matters.
keep abreast of changes in immigration laws and regulations and advise management on the implications.
2. recruitment and onboarding process:
manage the end-to-end recruitment process, including job postings, sourcing candidates, and interviewing.
implement strategies to attract top talent and build a strong employer brand.
looking for new channels for job advertising.
ensure the hiring process is smooth, offer, contract, social security fund,criminal check, health checkup, etc.
implement the orientation program for the new hire.
ensure a smooth and positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment and hiring process.
monitor the staff movement, probation period of new hire and coordinate with the line managers for the evaluation.
3.employee relations:
work closely with hr manager to manage employee relations issues, including conflict resolution, grievances, and disciplinary actions, ensuring fair and consistent application of policies.
promote a positive work environment and organizational culture that supports employee engagement and productivity.
conduct exit interviews and analyze feedback to identify areas for improvement.
4. performance management:
implement the performance management process, including task & target setting, appraisals, and gathering the result for annual increment.
work with department heads to identify and address performance issues, providing coaching and support as needed.
develop and implement employee development programs to enhance skills and career growth.
ensure alignment between individual performance goals and overall organizational objectives.
5. training and development:
identify training needs and develop programs to enhance employee skills and capabilities.
oversee the implementation of in-house training programs, technical training, leadership development, and other initiatives.
evaluate the effectiveness of training programs and make adjustments as necessary to meet the evolving needs of the organization.
6. compliance and legal:
ensure compliance with all applicable labor laws, regulations, and company policies.
keep abreast of changes in labor legislation and advise management on necessary actions.
7. hr database and application
manage the day-to-day operations of the hr database on the current hr application (people plus), including data entry and troubleshooting.
develop user guides, training materials, and faqs to assist employees in effectively using the hr application.
serve as the primary point of contact for hr application-related inquiries and issues.

supports partner institution(s) in identifying needs for external support and advice
formulates job descriptions and terms of reference, as well as selects and supervises third party consultants/grant recipients in the course of carrying out project activities
provides technical and related guidance to third party consultants/grant recipients to ensure effective and timely delivery of high-quality services to partner institution(s)
designs, prepares and organizes workshops, seminars and other events on issues related to the project/programme’s outputs and work packages
identify opportunities and support the project director to develop new businesses for different climate finance sources (iki, gcf, and other donors), involving various national partners, as appropriate
b. project management and coordination
supports the project director and partner institution(s) to develop work plans and implementation strategies for the project in order to fulfill the common objective(s) as identified in the project’s outcome and outputs
plans and manages project activities under relevant work packages, as assigned and agreed by the project director and in accordance with the project’s outcome and outputs
monitors project progress and activities in close consultation with relevant counterparts, reviews reports, identifies bottlenecks, develops and implements quality assurance measures, and, as necessary, recommends alternative management options to the project director
documents project progress, activities and challenges and provides relevant input to project’s monitoring and evaluation reports and related tools
regularly updates the project director on relevant project progress and seeks advice as needed to ensure high-quality, effective and timely execution of project activities
briefs the project director about key developments of climate change discussions in thailand, in the region and internationally
acts as a focal point for communication with partner agencies, as assigned by the project director
communicates and coordinates with relevant stakeholders to ensure effective and timely execution of project activities
communicates and coordinates with other projects and relevant working groups, clusters and other network mechanisms within giz to ensure synergies and harmonized approaches in delivery of services
c. communication and visibility
develops collaborative relationships with national partners, including relevant agencies and line ministries, academia, civil society organizations, and other relevant national and international organizations
liaises with partners and consultants to develop relevant communication materials, including newsletters, website contents and other outreach activities
helps coordinate the cooperation of the project with other national, regional and international programmes/projects
represents the project and giz in national and international events
d. knowledge management
ensures proper documentation of project information to promote knowledge transfer e.g. through dms and related tools
develops ready-to-use strategies and technical concepts, including guidelines, manuals and procedures
draws up reports and presentation documents
formulates appropriate input for various reports including annual reports, and contributes to other reports required by the project director and giz head office
assists with research activities and studies which benefit the project
e. other duties/additional tasks
performs other duties and tasks at the request of management

Job: Assistant Editor - Biology, Biochemistry, Bioengineering & Life Science
Description:
responsibilities:
communicate with scholars and organize the peer-review process for submitted manuscripts
make sure that accepted manuscripts fit our layout guidelines and can be published in a timely manner
maintain good lines of communication with the editor-in-chief, editorial board, authors, and reviewers to ensure the journal’s smooth operation
pay attention to progress in your assigned research fields and assist the managing editor in meeting the journal’s targets
complete other assigned tasks

หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ:
การออกแบบและวางแผนพื้นที่ภายใน:
สร้างแนวคิดและออกแบบพื้นที่ภายในสำหรับโครงการต่าง ๆ เช่น บ้าน, ออฟฟิศ, ร้านค้า หรือสถานที่สาธารณะ
พัฒนาแผนผัง, การจัดวาง, และรายละเอียดการออกแบบที่ตอบสนองความต้องการของลูกค้า
การเลือกวัสดุและเฟอร์นิเจอร์:
เลือกวัสดุ, เฟอร์นิเจอร์, และอุปกรณ์ตกแต่งที่เหมาะสมกับการออกแบบและงบประมาณ
ทำงานร่วมกับผู้ผลิตและซัพพลายเออร์เพื่อให้ได้วัสดุที่มีคุณภาพและราคาเหมาะสม
การสร้างแบบจำลองและการนำเสนอ:
สร้างแบบจำลอง 3 มิติ, ภาพพิมพ์, หรือแผนผังเพื่อช่วยในการนำเสนอแนวคิดแก่ลูกค้า
จัดเตรียมการนำเสนอที่แสดงให้เห็นถึงแนวคิดการออกแบบและการเลือกวัสดุ
การจัดการโครงการ:
วางแผนและติดตามความก้าวหน้าของโครงการเพื่อให้การดำเนินงานเป็นไปตามแผนที่กำหนด
ประสานงานกับผู้รับเหมา, ช่าง, และทีมงานเพื่อให้การติดตั้งเป็นไปอย่างราบรื่น
การให้คำปรึกษาและการบริการลูกค้า:
ให้คำแนะนำและคำปรึกษาแก่ลูกค้าเกี่ยวกับแนวทางการออกแบบและการตกแต่ง
รับฟังความคิดเห็นของลูกค้าและปรับเปลี่ยนการออกแบบตามความต้องการ
การตรวจสอบและควบคุมคุณภาพ:
ตรวจสอบคุณภาพการทำงานและวัสดุในการติดตั้งเพื่อให้ตรงตามข้อกำหนด
แก้ไขปัญหาและข้อผิดพลาดที่เกิดขึ้นในระหว่างการดำเนินงาน
การบริหารจัดการงบประมาณ:
จัดการและควบคุมงบประมาณของโครงการให้เป็นไปตามที่กำหนด
จัดทำประมาณการค่าใช้จ่ายและติดตามค่าใช้จ่ายของโครงการ
การพัฒนาและอัปเดตความรู้:
ติดตามแนวโน้มและเทคโนโลยีใหม่ ๆ ในการออกแบบภายใน
เข้าร่วมการฝึกอบรมและสัมมนาเพื่อพัฒนาทักษะและความรู้ด้านการออกแบบ

Job: OCEAN EXPORT OPERATION/เจ้าหน้าที่ประสานงานขาออกทางเรือ
Description:
รายละเอียดงาน
หน้าที่และรายละเอียดของงาน
ดำเนินการในส่วนของเรือขาออก ประสานงานต่างๆ
รายละเอียดงานเบื้องต้น
1.ทำ booking กับสายเรือ
2.ประสานงานกับสายเรือ
3.จัดบุ๊คให้ลูกค้า
4.ปล่อยบุ๊ค ประสานงานหัวลาก
5.ดูแล booking / first return closing time ให้หัวลาก
6.ประสานงานกับลูกค้า ทั้งใน และต่างประเทศ
7.แก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าเวลาตู้มีปัญหา
8.งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย

responsibilities:
communicate with japanese customers regarding production and shipping schedule.
inform customer’s requirement to production control, production or any concerned department.
communicate customer shipment requirement to export control team to arrange shipment accordingly.
check order allocation.
check shipment arrangement to be as schedule and report shipment to customer.
control shipment to catch each month sales.

Job: Technical Sales staff - Chemical Business (Fine Cleaning)
Description:
tasks & responsibilities
achieving growth and hitting sales & profit targets as team successfully
implementing the strategic sales plan that expand company business and customer presence
build and promote strong customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs
present and preparing sales report to management team
provide technical solution to customer together with r&d

Job: Electrical and Instrument Engineer (วิศวกรงานโครงการไฟฟ้า และเครื่องมือวัดฯ)
Description:
รายละเอียดของงาน
ติดตามความคืบหน้าของการดำเนินงานโครงการ เพื่อให้ส่งมอบโครงการได้ตามกำหนดเวลา(ผลสำเร็จของงาน: ส่งมอบงานตามแผนที่กำหนด)
ควบคุมและดำเนินการด้านต่างๆ เพื่อให้ค่าใช้จ่ายของแต่ละโครงการไม่เกินงบประมาณของโครงการ(ผลสำเร็จของงาน: ค่าใช้จ่ายของโครงการไม่เกินจากงบประมาณของโครงการ)
จัดทำ ตรวจสอบ และวิเคราะห์ด้านความปลอดภัย (job safety and environment analysis, jsea)ก่อนเริ่มปฏิบัติงานในแต่ละวัน (ผลสำเร็จของงาน: ไม่มีอุบัติเหตุ)
พิจารณาคัดเลือกผู้รับเหมา (contractor selection) ตามขอบเขตของโครงการ (scope of work) และการวางแผนการดำเนินงานด้านความปลอดภัยเป็นหลัก (ผลสำเร็จของงาน: เลือกผู้รับเหมาอย่างมีคุณภาพ)
ทบทวนและความเป็นไปได้ของโครงการที่ถูกนำเสนอเพื่อก่อสร้างในปีถัดไป (feasibility) (ผลสำเร็จของงาน: โครงการที่ได้รับการเสนอเกิดประโยชน์สูงสุดกับบริษัท)
จัดเตรียมทบทวนและประสานงานเกี่ยวกับกฎหมายเบื้องต้นและหน่วยงานภายนอกเพื่อให้โครงการสามารถดำเนินลุล่วงผ่านไปได้ (ผลสำเร็จของงาน: ดำเนินการได้สอดคล้องตามที่หน่วยงานราชการและอื่นๆเป็นผู้กำหนด)
จัดทำมาตรฐานของเครื่องจักรและอุปกรณ์ที่ได้รับการปรับปรุงระหว่างการดำเนินงานโครงการ เพื่อบันทึกเพิ่มเติมหรือแก้ไขในมาตรฐานการดำเนินงานโครงการ (project specification) ให้มีความทันสมัยอยู่เสมอ(ผลสำเร็จของงาน: มีข้อมูลใหม่ๆที่เกิดประโยชน์ กับการปฏิบัติงานสำหรับการเลือกซื้อเครื่องจักรในอนาคต)
การเตรียมเค้าโครงอุปกรณ์ไฟฟ้า (electrical equipment layout) (ผลสำเร็จของงาน: การนำเสนอโครงการของผู้รับเหมาเกิดความชัดเจนและสอดคล้องกับความต้องการ)
การเตรียมรายละเอียดการติดตั้งสำหรับงานด้านไฟฟ้าและเครื่องมือวัดฯ(ผลสำเร็จของงาน: การนำเสนอโครงการของผู้รับเหมาเกิดความชัดเจนและสอดคล้องกับความต้องการ)
การประเมินทางเทคนิคของข้อเสนอของผู้ขายและการอนุมัติทางเทคนิคขั้นสุดท้ายเพื่อขออนุมัติจากผู้บังคับบัญชา(ผลสำเร็จของงาน: โครงการที่ได้รับการเสนอเกิดประโยชน์สูงสุดกับบริษัท)
พิจารณาการประเมินผลงานผู้รับเหมาที่ได้เข้ามาดำเนินงานในแต่ละโครงการ เพื่อให้ผู้รับเหมามีการปรับปรุงการดำเนินงาน และเพื่อให้บริษัทมีผู้รับเหมาที่มีคุณภาพและประสิทธิภาพเข้ามาทำงาน(ผลสำเร็จของงาน: เลือกผู้รับเหมาอย่างมีคุณภาพ)
กระตุ้นให้บุคคลากรในสายงานและผู้รับเหมาที่ดำเนินงานโครงการให้ปฏิบัติตามขั้นตอนการปฏิบัติงานที่ดี(good work practice) รวมถึงเอกสารต่าง ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับงานโครงการอย่างเคร่งครัด

responsibilities
tech rep is the primary point of contact and shall be the liaison between ah and the customer so that information relating to the operation of the ah fleets can be expeditiously communicated.
support all maintenance tasks consistent with oem technical data including ad, easb/asb and sb.
guide the customer in accessing and using the information in airbusworld, t.i.p.i., t.o.o.l.s. and easa websites.
evaluate aircraft condition to establish possible solutions, e.g. due to corrosion, aging deterioration, in-service incidents.
provide on the job training for the customer covering field level of maintenance and operations, functional tests, inspection and repair activities related to aircraft systems.
provide on-site assistance at deployed bases as required.
tech rep shall prepare a weekly report to provide an overview of the aircraft usage, significant accomplishment of tech assistance activities, and identify any program issues that should be addressed, with emphasis on customer management views.

Company: Land and Houses Bank Public Company Limited
Index Living Mall Public Company Limited
Description:
key responsibilities:
sales management:
• oversee sales activities for index living mall, focusing on supporting and managing ilm franchisees and trade clients in international markets.
• develop and implement key account management and sales strategies to maintain and increase sales volume across diverse markets.
• drive efforts to expand the customer base by identifying and exploring new and emerging market opportunities overseas.
relationship building:
• establish and maintain long-term relationships with distributors, franchise partners, and other key stakeholders.
• act as the primary point of contact for franchisees, ensuring their needs are met and maintaining strong, positive relationships.
sales target achievement:
• be accountable for achieving and exceeding sales targets set for international markets.
• monitor and analyze sales performance, providing regular reports and insights to senior management.
client management:
• oversee client orders and product specifications, ensuring smooth collaboration with internal departments.
• ensure that all franchisees adhere to ilm’s brand standards and guidelines.
• address and resolve complaints effectively, ensuring customer satisfaction and long-term loyalty.
support and coordination:
• respond to and support customer requirements to ensure that products and services meet the highest standards, aligning with ilm brand expectations.
• coordinate closely with internal teams to ensure timely delivery, quality assurance, and compliance with client specifications.
brand compliance:
• ensure that all franchisees consistently follow index living mall's brand standards and operational guidelines, upholding the brand's reputation in international markets.
market expansion:
• identify potential markets and evaluate opportunities for expansion. develop strategic plans to enter new territories and grow the business in existing regions.
customer feedback and improvement:
• gather customer feedback and work with internal teams to implement necessary improvements to products and services. ensure that customer insights are leveraged to enhance the overall customer experience.
travel and communication:
• conduct sales activities primarily through email and online meetings, with the flexibility and willingness to travel internationally as required to meet with franchisees, distributors, and clients.
other responsibilities:
• take on additional tasks and projects as assigned by the international sales manager to support the overall goals of the department and company.
skills / experience:
• any nationality
• excellent english communication skills, both written and verbal.
• proficiency in basic computer programs (e.g., microsoft office).
• experience in overseas sales and working with international clients.
• strong team player with a positive working attitude and a results-oriented approach.
• ability to learn new concepts quickly and work effectively under pressure.
preferred skills / experience:
• experience in the retail business, particularly in international markets.
• knowledge or technical sales experience in the furniture/furnishings industry is an advantage.
• familiarity with import/export processes.

job responsibilities:
oversea mobility
coordinate with pic in asia & oceania [ao] honda entity company to get the required information of ao expat for preparation on his/her assignment
calculate the salary and benefit support during associate is assigned to work/ training in overseas country
coordinate with travel, apartment, shipping agency and others to facilitate ao expat in living conditions.
plan and control labor cost expense which related to expatriate matter.

job description :

Job: เจ้าหน้าที่ประสานงานขาย
Description:
key responsibilities (หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบหลัก)
จัดทำและประสานงาน รับคำสั่งซื้อสินค้าและการจัดทำเอกสารประกอบการจำหน่ายสินค้าให้กับลูกค้า

ตรวจสอบคำสั่งซื้อลูกค้าpurchase order ก่อนการออกเอกสารการขายล่วงหน้า ขายสด ขายเชื่อ
ตรวจสอบเงื่อนไขการขายกับลูกค้ารายเก่า และการเปิดลูกค้ารายใหม่ในระบบ
จัดทำและติดตามเอกสารใบกำกับภาษี /ใบส่งของ ขายล่วงหน้า ขายสด ขายเชื่อ และ เผยแพร่
จัดทำเอกสารด้านบัญชี เช่น ใบลดหนี้ ใบเพิ่มหนี้
จัดทำรายการเบิกสินค้าของหน่วยขาย
ประสานงานและเตรียมการส่งสินค้า และเผยแพร่ ให้ถูกต้องครบถ้วนทันตามเวลา
จัดทำและสรุปรายการจัดส่งสินค้าประจำวัน และรายเดือน

responsibilities

Job: Sales Representative for Pet Food รับสมัครด่วน!!
Description:
รายละเอียดงาน
• ขายสินค้ากลุ่มอาหารสัตว์ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย
• มุ่งเน้นการผลักดันยอดขายในพื้นที่
• เพื่อให้บรรลุเป้าหมายการขายและการจัดจำหน่าย
• ประเมินสาขา เป้าหมาย และข้อมูลการค้าเป็นประจำเพื่อผลักดันการปรับปรุงประสิทธิภาพการขาย
• เพื่อให้มั่นใจว่ามีมาตรฐานระดับสูงในการนำเสนอและการจำหน่ายผลิตภัณฑ์หลักในการค้า
• เพื่อให้มั่นใจว่ามีการดำเนินการตามระดับราคาเป้าหมายสำหรับทั้งการค้าและผู้บริโภค
• ระบุร้านค้าเป้าหมาย เจรจาและดำเนินกิจกรรมส่งเสริมการขายด้วยมาตรฐานสูงสุดที่เป็นไปได้
• ติดตามประสิทธิภาพการส่งเสริมการขายและข้อเสนอแนะ เพื่อนำเสนอฝ่ายบริหาร
• เพื่อให้มั่นใจว่าการเรียกเก็บเงินเชิงรุกและการจัดการลูกหนี้เพื่อให้บรรลุเป้าหมายการเรียกเก็บเงินตามที่ฝ่ายบริหารการขายกำหนด
• พัฒนาและรักษาความสัมพันธ์แบบ win-win กับลูกค้ารายสำคัญ
• จัดการและปรับปรุงประสิทธิภาพของการขายที่ได้รับมอบหมาย

responsibilities
end-to-end media strategy: develop and implement holistic media plans across various online channels (search, display, social, video, etc.) tailored to the thai market, focusing on each stage of the customer journey from awareness to conversion and beyond.
gmv-driven approach: design and execute media campaigns with a clear focus on driving measurable gmv growth, aligning media tactics with overall business objectives.
social media integration: leverage social media platforms popular in thailand (e.g., facebook, line, instagram, tiktok) to build brand awareness, engage audiences, and drive traffic to conversion points.
full-funnel optimization: continuously analyze and optimize media performance across the entire funnel, identifying opportunities to improve efficiency and maximize gmv impact.
data-driven decision making: utilize data and analytics to measure media performance in thailand, identify trends, and make informed decisions to optimize future campaigns for gmv growth.
campaign management: collaborate with creative and account teams to ensure seamless campaign execution and delivery across online platforms, with a focus on thai language and cultural nuances.
vendor relationships: build and maintain strong relationships with online media vendors and agencies specializing in the thai market.
budget management: track and manage online media budgets, ensuring cost-efficiency and adherence to financial guidelines for thailand-focused campaigns, with a focus on gmv roi.
stay current: stay informed about industry trends, emerging online platforms, and best practices in online media planning, with a particular focus on the thai market and gmv-driven strategies.

responsibilities:
conduct thorough financial evaluations employing financial models to forecast future scenarios and precisely assess risks for managerial deliberations, contributing to the formation of strategic recommendations.
establish and enhance strategies for debt capital structure and dividends in line with treasury guidelines and goals.
manage all aspects of the company's financial risk exposures, including foreign exchange and interest rate risks, with a focus on minimizing volatility impact.
identify and pursue cost-effective opportunities to mitigate risk while preserving corporate stability and liquidity.
make informed and strategic investment decisions in collaboration with approved counterparties to maximize returns.
explore innovative products, technologies, and systems to enhance treasury operations and efficiency.
implement and maintain robust treasury controls to safeguard corporate assets and ensure compliance with policies and regulations.
lead discussions and inspire action among stakeholders by providing timely insights and strategic guidance.

responsibility:

ensure that you have been trained and strictly follow our safety rules at workplace.
ensure compliance with the company's management system, policies and rules.
ensure that company database is in availability

suggest improvement for software, database and web application.
control related documentation and keep filing system according to procedures.
support all computer and software issues in electronics/mechanic production department if requested from the others.
make documentation and report for projects.
contact to internal and external suppliers or institutes as assigned by technology manager
perform all tasks with awareness of safety. always working equiped with ppe (personel protection equipment) while working in company area
participate in 7s/lean/kaizen/6sigma and other improvement activities.

tasks & responsibilities
planning, development and implementation of all of the company’s digital marketing plan.
operate, execute and monitor all digital marketing, including google analytics, facebook ads, ads optimize and campaigns.
measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns and assess against goals.
create and write content for target clients to promote the company’s services.
lead and manage external marketing projects within your area of responsibility.
support and deliver cyber security sales and brand awareness goals through events and other marketing initiatives that foster new and engage existing members of target audience groups.
proactively monitor emerging trends within the cyber security and marketing, flagging relevant reports to ceo, as needed.
track marketing campaigns, e-marketing and subscriber lists, and other necessary information in crm systems to make sure the achievement of sales target.
program and deploy content across all assigned digital channels according to the digital marketing campaign calendar.
measure the success of each campaign based on the performance of channel kpis and create monthly reports on the effectiveness of all campaigns.
develop and implement search engine optimization (seo) and search engine marketing (sem) strategies to increase online visibility and drive traffic to our digital properties

Description:
roles and responsibilities
data analysis and interpretation:
proficiently analyze intricate datasets to identify trends, patterns, and outliers.
unearth insightful correlations and present findings in a clear, understandable manner.
translate raw data into actionable insights that drive client business objectives.
client collaboration:
engage with clients to understand their unique business needs and challenges.
translate client requirements into comprehensive project scopes and deliverables.
foster strong client relationships through effective communication and partnership.
strategic recommendations:
leverage your analytical prowess to provide informed recommendations to clients.
collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven strategies.
contribute to client success by helping them make informed, growth-oriented decisions.
data visualization and reporting:
create visually compelling dashboards, reports, and presentations.
tailor data visualizations to resonate with both technical and non-technical audiences.
communicate complex insights using accessible and engaging visual aids.
process enhancement:
identify operational inefficiencies within client workflows using data-driven insights.
propose process improvements and streamlined solutions to optimize client operations.
assist clients in adopting best practices for leveraging data effectively.

Company: Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited (AIS)
Description:
responsibilities:
- build the reporting data model and help the data engineering team with creating views , sql scripts
- monitor etl processes, system audits, dashboard reporting and presentation layer functioning and performance
- use business intelligence and visualization software (e.g., aws, redshift, tableau, powerbi, quicksight, ) to empower non-technical, internal customers to drive their own analytics and reporting
- monitor etl processes, system audits, dashboard reporting and presentation layer functioning and performance and pro-actively fix issues as found
- provide complex analysis, conceptualize, design, implement and develop solutions for critical bi components
- perform dataflow, system and data analysis and develop meaningful and useful presentation of data in bi applications
- plan and implement standards, define/code conformed global and reusable objects, perform complex database design, data modelling (edw and programming and streamline the systems
- contribute to data analysis, design and development of new and ongoing business intelligence (bi) projects involving complex edw structures or on oltp systems
- collaborate closely with internal and external teams to understand and apply changes/modifications impacting data warehouse

excellent with database or data warehouse or etl tools (extract transform and load) technique and framework

หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ:
ดูแลและเฝ้าระวังความมั่นคงปลอดภัยของ web application firewall, database firewall การประเมินช่องโหว่ของระบบ และการปรับปรุงการตั้งค่าเงื่อนไขต่างๆ เพื่อปิดช่องโหว่ของระบบและโอกาสในการโจมตีโดยอัตโนมัติ เพื่อทดสอบและแก้ไขกรณีการแจ้งสถานะการป้องกันที่ผิดพลาด
ดูแลและบริหารจัดการความมั่นคงปลอดภัยของ web application ทั้งการป้องกันการโจมตีและการตั้งรับเมื่อมีการโจมตีช่องโหว่ต่างๆ
จัดทำเอกสารเชิงเทคนิคที่เกี่ยวข้องทั้งหมด ทั้งเอกสารส่งมอบต่างๆ ของโครงการที่ร้บผิดชอบ และเนื้อหาสำหรับการถ่ายทอดองค์ความรู้ให้ทีมงานและลูกค้า
เตรียมการ จัดทำและเป็นผู้ดำเนินการทดสอบเพื่อพิสูจน์ (proof of concept: poc) สมมติฐานการใช้งานของลูกค้าด้วยองค์ประกอบทางเทคโนโลยี ผลิตภัณฑ์ และสภาวะแวดล้อมตามเงื่อนไขของลูกค้า หรือ การกำหนดขอบเขตงานจากทีมพัฒนาธุรกิจ (ฝ่ายขาย)
ติดตาม ตรวจสอบ เฝ้าระวัง ปฏิบัติการต่างๆ เพื่อให้รองรับการใช้งานทางธุรกิจและให้บริการอย่างมีเสถียรภาพ
บริการด้านองค์ความรู้ของเทคโนโลยีผลิตภัณฑ์ คำแนะนำ เป็นที่ปรึกษาในการดูแลและแก้ปัญหาเกี่ยวกับ web application security
ประสานงานกับบริษัทผู้ผลิต หรือ ผู้ขายผลิตภัณฑ์ เพื่อดำเนินการแก้ปัญหา วิเคราะห์หาสาเหตุที่แท้จริง การตรวจสอบเชิงลึกทางเทคนิค
ดูแลบริหารจัดการปฏิบัติการต่างๆ ในแต่ละวัน จัดให้มีบริการเพื่อรองรับระบบงานตลอด 24 ชั่วโมง ทุกวัน
ติดตาม วิเคราะห์ และศึกษาค้นคว้าข้อมูลข่าวสารทางเทคโนโลยี ข้อมูลผลิตภัณฑ์ และองค์ความรู้ใหม่ ๆ ทางด้านความมั่นคงปลอดภัยทางไซเบอร์ แล้วนำองค์ความรู้หรือข้อสรุปต่างๆ มาถ่ายทอดให้กับทีมงาน และ/หรือ ลูกค้า

job responsibilities:
1.sales management
– guide stores to set daily sales targets based on the monthly sales goals set by the headquarters and ultimately achieve the sales budget for the managed area. monitor daily sales data for stores in the region, understand reasons for any shortfall in daily sales budgets, and provide guidance to store management teams to achieve targets.
2.personnel management –
supervise and guide store management teams to stabilize store personnel structures and create plans to improve overall kpi results.
3.profit and loss management
– monitor store report data and analyze metrics such as gross profit, profit, costs, and losses.
4.goal management
– set phased sales targets, store improvement goals, and assist store managers in setting employee development goals. follow up on these quantifiable goals with set deadlines.
5.standards management
– handle principled issues according to company standards; continuously set and achieve the highest standards for store management teams, effectively judge and make decisions on all standard issues.
6.cost management
– reduce company costs by guiding stores in implementing personnel cost control and expense control measures. manage controllable expenses for stores in the region.
7.safety management
– enhance safety awareness among all regional store employees and set safety management requirements for special equipment like cash registers, fire equipment, and surveillance devices. ensure store employees work according to regulations to reduce workplace injuries.
8.brand management
– lead internal employees to provide an excellent experience for external customers, fostering brand loyalty. understand and convey the company’s brand philosophy and development vision, promoting employee brand awareness to achieve customer recognition of the brand.

Job: Service Delivery Project Assistant Manager(Project Management)
Description:
responsibilities:
project leadership and management lead and oversee projects from initiation to completion.
ensure alignment with organizational goals and objectives, create a roadmap, and establish priorities.
develop project charters, timelines, and status reports.
monitor project progress and performance metrics.
support the scrum team in executing sprints:utilizing agile metrics and tools to track team velocity, project status, and deliverables.
assist with daily scrum facilitation, ensuring focus and clear communication.
track progress and update task or backlog throughout the sprint according project planning.
participate in sprint planning and retrospectives, offering data-driven insights.
help maintain and prioritize the product backlog under guidance.
contribute to project administration and reporting:develop and maintain project documentation.
prepare basic reports and presentations on project status and metrics.
assist with stakeholder communication, keeping them informed of progress.
additional responsibilities: assist with project risk management and issue resolution.
ensure clear communication and alignment throughout the project lifecycle.
handle basic administrative tasks and manage project resources.
collaborate with other teams and departments as needed.

role description:
kenan foundation asia, a non-profit development organization working in partnership with companies, governments, academia, and committed individuals to empower people with the knowledge, technology, and skills necessary for a better future, is seeking a highly motivated and qualified person for the position of
manager (education)
you will be responsible to manage and maintain relationships with partners in various organizations for projects and also engage the industry sector, education providers and key stakeholders to determine critical skills needs and leverage training expertise and resources from the stakeholders to support the transition of pipeline graduates into the workforce.
the manager will report to the senior manager of education program.
key responsibilities:
project management
lead project management within kenan's innovative education area, focusing on stem education, environmental education, educational technology, technical and vocational education and education-to-employment.
plan, design, and implement projects by executing necessary actions, including capacity building, research, analysis, sub-grant management, budget management, monitoring and evaluation, and project reporting according to donor requirements and expectations.
provide technical expertise and insights on global development trends to support kenan’s strategic focus in expanding program operations within the innovative education area.
contribute to project design and adaptation by offering technical knowledge on innovative education strategies, supporting new proposals, and adjusting ongoing projects to meet evolving program contexts.
team management
coach and develop team members to ensure effective program delivery.
stakeholder management
develop and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders, including project partners, government officials, beneficiaries, and donors.

Company: Titan Dealer Management Solutions Limited (Head Office)
Description:
key responsibilities :
ongoing development and management of prospecting database
support the generation of leads through various communications including on-site dealer visitations, phone and email contact, etc.
perform dealer needs analysis through an exploration of requirements; both informally to convey titan’s value proposition during sales conversations, then more formally to feed into installation requirements for contract submissions.
effectively understand the expectations and challenges of the dealer to ensure contracts drawn reflect the dealer requirements, whilst maintaining titan’s minimum service standards for product delivery.
to perform account management functions, in order to develop a strong referral base with which to build from.
the successful candidate will have :
drive, an eagerness to perform and energy that is second to none.
5+ years of experience in sales and account management roles with demonstrable results.
experience in the automotive environment, and familiarity with dealer management systems or tier 2 enterprise resource planning (erp) solutions for the retail industry.
enterprise software sales experience to sme's and corporate clients.
solutions and consultative selling ability is mandatory.
established contact and relationships within the automotive sector.
an ability to engage with people at all levels within an automotive dealership.
excellent verbal and written communication skills.
a proven ability to work independently and without supervision.
an ability to demonstrate a high level of attention to detail.
a strong work ethic, and be motivated by the results they will achieve.
strong written and verbal english skills.
a valid driver’s license and passport.
experience in promoting technology products or services would be highly advantageous.

job responsibilities :
proposing strategies for debt management to ensure maximum efficiency in debt collection.
setting challenge goals and relevant performance indicators for debt management and facilitating each department in creating effective annual action plans to achieve the established targets.
developing debt collection plans and budget plans for debt management, while also monitoring and controlling the expenditure effectively.
reporting on the overall performance of the department to the relevant management team.
analyzing and processing data related to debt management to provide insights for strategic decision-making by the management.

Company: Big C Supercenter Public Company Limited
Description:
tasks & responsibilities
รับเรื่องร้องเรียน การแจ้ง claim จากทุกสาขา รวมทั้งประสานงานหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องดำเนินการตรวจสอบ ตามขั้นตอนที่ถูกต้องจนจบขั้นตอน รวมทั้งวิเคราะห์หาสาเหตุ

คะแนน:
ผู้นำธุกิจค้าปลีก ในรูปแบบของ "ไฮเปอร์มาร์เก็ต" หรือ "ซูเปอร์เซ็นเตอร์", ธุรกิจค้าปลีกสมัยใหม่ที่มีรูปแบบและขนาดที่หลากหลายภายใต้การบริหารงานของบริษัท บิ๊กซี ซูเปอร์เซ็นเตอร์ จำกัด (มหาชน) และพันธมิตรทางธุรกิจ ปัจจุบันบิ๊กซีมีสาขาที่เปิดให้บริการแล้วมากกว่า 100 สาขาทั่วประเทศ และมีพนักงานประจำมากกว่า 23,000 คน บิ๊กซีมอบโอกาสก้าวหน้าในการทำงานตั้งแต่ระดับพนักงาน ไปจนถึงระดับบริหาร ทั้งในสำนักงานใหญ่และสาขาต่างๆทั่วประเทศ
ร่วมงานกับเรา:
development project for potential personnel believing that the success is when our people is a great, big c has assigned budget for potential personnel development project with a primary aim to bring employees who are qualified and ambitious to achieve their goal and to maintain them within our organization. big c needs skilled people as a driving force and possessing leadership to undertake roles and responsibilities which is a part of corporate success in years to come. this project is designed to support potential development efficiently. attendees will learn and leverage themselves through leadership development program, position rotation within the organization, assignment for performing work abroad and succession plan.
สำนักงานใหญ่:
97/11 fl.6 ratchadamri road (bts chidlom)

Job: ผู้ช่วยเภสัชกรวิจัย (Research Pharmacist Assistant)
Description:
หน้าที่
1.รับและจัดเก็บยาวิจัย ตามที่โครงการฯกำหนด
2.ตรวจสอบจำนวน วันหมดอายุ ของยาวิจัยประจำเดือน
3.ตรวจสอบ และบันทึกอุณหภูมิที่เก็บยาวิจัย ความชื้นภายในห้องวิจัย
4.การดูแลเครื่องมือและอุปกรณ์ควบคุมอุณภูมิต่างๆ ในห้องยา ให้ได้ได้รับการสอบเทียบตามมาตรฐาน
5.นำส่งยาวิจัยไปยังห้องผสม(ควบคุมอุณภูมิตามที่โครงการวิจัยกำหนด)
6.นำยาวิจัยส่งทำลายยังหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องตามมาตรฐานการทำลายยาวิจัย และติดตามเอกสารยืนยันการทำลายยา
7.จัดทำและวางแผนการจัดเก็บ-ขนส่งยาวิจัยกับทีมที่เกี่ยวข้องในงาน ก่อนเริ่มโครงการวิจัยนั้นๆ
8.จัดทำบันทึกไปยังหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องและแผนซ้อมย้ายยาวิจัยเมื่อเกิดเหตุฉุกเฉิน
9.จัดทำและปรับปรุง sop ของทีมเภสัชกรวิจัยให้เป็นปัจจุบันเสมอ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย
10.เตรียมและบันทึกรายงานการประชุมประจำเดือน
11.บริหารจัดการ ดูแลความสะอาดเรียบร้อยภายในห้องเก็บยาวิจัย
12.tracking ค่าผสมยาและค่าพยาบาลให้ยา
13.งานอื่น ๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากหัวหน้างาน
วุฒิการศึกษา
1.จบปริญญาตรีทางด้านวิทยาศาสตร์การแพทย์, วิทยาศาตรบัณฑิต, วิทยาศาสตร์สายสุขภาพ หรือหากมีประสบการณ์การทำงานจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

key responsibilities:
assist an audit project lead to conduct the full audit cycle of assigned business audits and communicate findings and areas for improvement to the ia head and excom/ ops com.
be an agent for change by delivering quality audit reports with practical, effective and actionable recommendations, agreed with management, and aligned to the company’s strategy, including digital transformation, cx and innovation.
conduct follow up reviews to ensure effective remediation of audit findings and positive improvement and impact to the control environment
assist the development of the three-year audit plan and the annual plan by performing risk assessments with 2nd line, excom/ ops com, and other key stakeholders
prepare papers for monthly excom/ ops com, and/or monthly group reporting
promote innovative and technology driven auditing techniques through the use of data analytics and other automated auditing tools.

ความรับผิดชอบ:

จัดเตรียมเอกสารในการยื่นขอเครดิตจากธนาคาร (loan, tr, lc, tt)

key responsibilities:
team leadership:
supervise and support the concierge team, including hiring, training, scheduling, and performance management. provide guidance and coaching to ensure high levels of service and professionalism.
customer service excellence:
ensure that all residents, tenants, and visitors receive exceptional service. handle escalated issues and complaints, resolving them efficiently and professionally.
operational management:
oversee front desk operations, ensuring that all tasks, such as package management, access control, and resident requests, are handled promptly and accurately.
quality control:
regularly monitor and assess the performance of concierge staff, providing feedback and implementing improvements where necessary. ensure that all procedures and standards are consistently followed.
coordination with property management:
work closely with the property management team to ensure alignment on resident/tenant communications, maintenance requests, and community events. act as a liaison between the concierge team and other departments.
event planning and coordination:
assist in organizing and managing events for residents and tenants, ensuring that concierge staff are fully briefed and prepared to support these activities.
emergency response management:
lead the concierge team in responding to emergencies, ensuring that procedures are followed, and that the safety and security of residents and the property are prioritized.
staff scheduling and coverage:
create and manage staff schedules, ensuring adequate coverage during all shifts. address any staffing issues, such as absences or peak periods, by adjusting resources as necessary.
reporting and documentation:
maintain accurate records of concierge activities, including incident reports, maintenance requests, and resident/tenant interactions. prepare reports for property management as required.
training and development:
develop and deliver training programs to enhance the skills and knowledge of the concierge team. ensure that staff are familiar with property management systems and procedures.
4 subordinates

key responsibilities:
develop, research, and identify prospective talent to build a pipeline of qualified candidates.
act as a strategic partner to hiring managers, understanding job opening requirements and providing insights.
define, refine, execute, and communicate search strategies tailored to specific roles and regions.
act as an expert in assigned regions, lines of business, functions, and technologies.
analyze industry, product, and geographical trends to identify talent opportunities.
determine appropriate recruiting sources for advertising and posting positions.
promote the company image to candidates and external service providers.
document and evaluate the recruiting and candidate interview process.
negotiate and/or support hiring managers in developing new hire compensation packages/offers.
manage tools, resources, and technologies to identify talent efficiently, with a strong emphasis on workday.
conduct employment background checks as needed.
work with agencies, recruiting contractors, and/or internet website representatives for employment advertising campaigns.
develop, support, and maintain college recruiting, affirmative action, and career development programs.
assist with the immigration process and administration, acting as a liaison with immigration attorneys.

Company: Big C Supercenter Public Company Limited

Job: Service Engineer on-site and online (film stretching lines) (PLC Siemens)

Description:
role and responsibilities:
● learning and understanding the current business and system with the infrastructure.
● responsible for gathering and designing the system (ui, database, process, report) from business requirements.
● identifying, collecting, and recommending appropriate system solutions.
● responsible for creating and maintaining related documents such as system requirements, system flow, system design, database design, etc.
● coordinate with developer teams, users, and third parties/vendors to support the development process.
● work with the technical and development team to ensure that they understand the specifications.

main responsibilities:
conduct audit in an accurate, detailed, and timely manner, write comprehensive report of findings in compliance with standards/sop/client requirement and applicable standards and procedures.
review reference audit documents, i.e., standards, client’s sop/procedure, etc., prior, during and after audit to execution of audit to ascertain completeness of information / document and complete understanding of applicable audit requirements.
prioritize, plan, organized work efficiently to deliver first-rate audit services and end products such as audit recaps, reports and other client specific reporting tools.
prepare and submit the audit report within time frame, preferably on the next working day.
represent the company with integrity, professionalism, and skills when conducting the audit

job responsibilities:
•feasibility study and fine out new opportunity to improvement with machine automation.
•reduce manual operation and replacement with machine automation.
•design customize machine automation, and consult with engineering and manufacturing teammates to ensure that designs are feasible.
•develop and build prototypes and run tests to measure their level of function.
•record and evaluate testing data, altering designs as necessary to bring them to safety, performance and efficiency standards.
•technology scouting and apply with business as require to be increasing productivity quality ,cost reductions.
•research competitor products quarterly and collaborate with product development team to generate ideas for making our products the best ones on the market.

responsibilities
client interaction:
serve as the first point of contact for new client inquiries via various channels (e.g., vdo meetings, telephone, face-to-face). escalate complex or large-scale inquiries to the account manager as needed.
request handling:
address urgent customer requests promptly via phone, email, and messages. support the preparation and management of sales documentation.
order processing:
enter order information into the company database, manage client account inquiries, and coordinate with customers to build and maintain relationships.
sales coordination:
assist the sales team by managing schedules, filing documents, and communicating relevant information effectively.
cross-department collaboration:
work with marketing, outsourcing, and other departments to optimize sales processes and enhance customer satisfaction.
sales monitoring:
track sales performance using tools and report progress to the account manager. participate in weekly meetings to create and maintain month-end sales reports.
performance indicators:
develop and monitor performance indicators for new sales and service delivery. analyze sales trends and provide recommendations for improvements.

responsibilities
technical support activities for the complete spectrum of automation products such as industrial pc, fieldbus components, pc/nc automation software, drives technology and complete pc-based automation solutions
programming support for our customers’ application in iec61131-3 (st, lad, sfc, fbd and il).
work with and support development of customer-specific control applications.
working together with sale department to achieve the target.
conduct product and application training.

key responsibilities and activity
วางแผนการทำบทความเพื่อให้ตอบโจทย์ตามความต้องการของลูกค้าในช่วงเวลาต่างๆ ได้

Job: ผู้จัดการแผนกวางแผนการผลิต
Company: S&J International Enterprises Public Company Limited
Description:
หน้าที่และรายละเอียดของงาน

key responsibilities
financial strategy and leadership
: direct and coordinate the organization’s financial and budget activities to support business operations, optimize investments, and increase overall efficiency. provide strategic financial guidance and support to the ceo and the board of directors.
budgeting and performance analysis
: prepare budgets and forecasts, review and analyze business performance against the budget plan, and communicate results and insights to shareholders and partners.
financial and regulatory reporting
: oversee the preparation of financial statements, regulatory reports, and other financial documentation required by stakeholders, ensuring accuracy and compliance with relevant laws and regulations.
internal controls and compliance
: lead the team in developing and implementing internal control processes, accounting procedures, and compliance measures to safeguard the company’s financial assets and ensure legal compliance.
financial analysis and advisory
: analyze financial data to assess the company’s current and future financial status. provide the ceo with regular insights and advice on the financial implications of business activities, performance analysis, and strategic planning.
collaboration and coordination
: work closely with board members, the ceo, and other staff to discuss issues, coordinate activities, and resolve problems. collaborate with external auditors, financial advisors, legal teams, shareholders, and the audit committee.
operational and cost efficiency
: analyze operations to evaluate performance and identify areas for potential cost reduction, program improvement, or policy changes. drive operational efficiencies and process improvements across financial functions.
stakeholder relations and negotiations
: develop and maintain strong relationships with banks, investors, and other key stakeholders. negotiate and secure favorable terms to optimize financial outcomes for the company.

Job: Customer Service Advisor/ ที่ปรึกษาบริการลูกค้า
Description:
key responsibilities:
- serve as the primary contact point for all customer inquiries related to aftersales, service and warranty.
- communicate daily with customers regarding quotations, purchase orders, and delivery schedules.
- respond promptly to customer inquiries, complaints, and claims via telephone, email, and other channels.
- coordinate all stages of the ordering cycle from customer inquiries to product delivery.
- schedule and coordinate service and warranty jobs to meet promised delivery dates.
- collaborate with internal departments to ensure seamless communication of customer requirements and on-time delivery.
- coordinate with relevant parties to address any deviations from promised delivery dates.
- work closely with sales, engineering, quality, and manufacturing departments to address customer concerns and claims.
- communicate and coordinate with internal departments to resolve after-sales issues.
- maintain detailed records of customer interactions, transactions, complaints, and resolutions.
- focus on ensuring customer satisfaction and nurturing positive relationships.
- provide weekly and monthly reports to the manager.
- undertake any other tasks as assigned by the manager.

Job: Engineer Manager/Building Manager ผู้จัดการวิศวกรและช่าง
Description:
duties and responsibilities:
1. task assignment and issue resolution:
perform tasks assigned by the building manager and assist in resolving issues related to building systems based on tenant complaints.
provide guidance to maintenance workers and assist in supervising their work to ensure compliance with planned objectives.
report work progress to the building manager regularly.
2. repairs and maintenance coordination:
organize repairs and maintenance of central equipment to ensure optimal condition and reliability.
coordinate with contractors for repairs, maintenance, and installation of building equipment.
source suppliers and compare prices for equipment.
prepare bidding specifications for equipment purchases and services.
3.maintenance worker supervision and scheduling:
supervise maintenance workers and ensure adherence to company policies.
create monthly work schedules for maintenance workers.
source and provide sufficient equipment and tools for maintenance tasks.
4.maintenance scheduling and documentation:
establish maintenance schedules for various building systems and ensure complete documentation.
monitor and analyze energy usage, developing energy-saving guidelines with minimal impact on tenants.
prepare energy conservation forms (form 1 and form 2) for submission to the department of energy conservation if applicable.
5. interior fit-out work coordination scope
review cut-shop drawings or as-built drawings submitted by contractor, to make sure that the drawings are aligned with site condition and handover specification.
participate and help inspect during the handover inspection from contractor to building management of the mep systems.
to ensure that the handover inspection from building management to tenant, the site condition is in line with cut-shop or as-built drawings and handover specification.
review and provide recommendation of the design, drawings, and calculations submitted from tenants to make sure the proposed design complied with bts visionary park tenant fit-out guidelines, local rules, regulations, and safety standard.
review and provide recommendation of the materials proposed from tenants.
review and provide recommendation on fit-out construction program.
periodically inspect tenant’s unit during construction, to make sure the construction is in line with submitted and approved design. provide recommendation as required.
final inspection of the tenant’s unit to make sure the installation and construction complied with bts visionary park tenant fit-out guidelines, local rules, regulations, and safety standard.
review the submitted as-built drawings from tenant.
6. space renovations and equipment installation:
prepare documentation for space renovations or the installation of various equipment.
coordinate with contractors for space renovations and ensure compliance with specifications and standards.
7. compliance and emergency preparedness:
check and approve work requests from contractors requesting access to the building.
develop and update emergency contingency plans as guidelines for building engineers in case of emergencies.

responsibilities:

project planning and execution

a. responsibilities
theadministrative assistance is responsible for:
ensuring that project implementation runs smoothly
ensuring good communication flow with the project director and staff
performing daily operations of all administrative tasks for the project director and the entire project office
filing documents in reference files or in dms in line with giz’s filing rules
b. tasks
theadministrative assistance is expected to perform the following tasks:
office management, office coordination and secretariat services
performs general office management tasks to ensure project office is well-equipped and well-maintained to support well-functioning of project staff, while consulting closely with project director
manages and organises incoming and outgoing correspondence (phone, post, fax, email)
welcomes visitors in a friendly manner and serves them with beverages
coordinates appointments as requested by the project director
coordinates and organises rooms for meetings, and arranges equipment etc. required
prepares and organises information materials for the project director and/or meetings
participates in internal and external meetings and workshops and assists with preparing and documenting these
assists in creating, updating, and maintaining a filing system for the office, treats information confidentially, specifically in the areas of personnel and finance
maintains the inventory list for the office/project/programme, as required by project
performs other duties and tasks at the request of management
c. financial management and accounting services
implements and monitors for an overall smooth and correct functioning of the complete financial accounting system of the project in line with giz standard procedures, ensuring that the services are provided correctly according to giz financial and accounting guidelines and procedures
carries out accounting on the basis of win pacs accounting software
handles petty cash and all bank-related matters
executes cash payments and collects/prepares proper receipts
checks and updates the cash book (bank and petty cash transactions), and monitors the daily cash flow records and the level of liquidity
prepares monthly/balance sheets/bank reconciliation/cash payment reports and monthly project journal/financial report
calculates daily allowance and staff over time (if any)
verifies correctness of vouchers, incoming invoices, e.g. plane tickets, hotel, telephone, mobile phone, internet and other fees, including relevant supporting documents, and arrange for payment
works closely with project staff to prepare, update and control all kind of contracts, contract fulfilment, and initiates payments
monitors costs and expenses monthly, and reports financial status to project director on a regular basis
prepares monthly and annual budgets and tracking variances
sends accountants and bookkeeping reports to giz office bangkok at the end of every month
maintains proper and confidential filing of financial related documents, office asset register and project’s inventory list
monitors time allocated to projects, controls annual local budget and its limits
complies with and carries out project’s vat zero implementation
immediately reports all problems/concerns involving finance and regulations to project director
d. required qualifications, competence and experience
university degree in accounting, management, administration or similar areas
minimum 5 years of professional experience in a comparable position
good working knowledge of itc technologies (related software, phone, fax, email, the internet) and computer applications (e.g. ms office, ms team)
good command of spoken and written english and thai
excellent communication skills, with positive teamwork and people-oriented attitudes
excellent organisational and management skills, with detail-oriented mindset
readiness to travel within thailand or abroad, subject to project requirements
interest to work on climate change and sustainability topics and willingness to upskill as required by the tasks to be performed
interest and ability to work in a cross-cultural context and team
duty station and time frame:
the position will be based in one of giz project offices in bangkok.
this will be a fixed-term contract, starting as soon as possible and running until31december 2024, with possibility for extension.

Job: Production Planning Engineering Manager - EV Motorcycle
Description:
main responsibilities:
production planning and scheduling:
develop and implement production schedules to meet demand forecasts.
coordinate with supply chain management to ensure timely procurement of materials and components.
process optimization:
analyze production processes to identify areas for improvement and efficiency gains.
implement lean manufacturing principles to reduce waste and improve productivity.
quality control:
ensure that manufacturing processes adhere to quality standards and regulations.
oversee quality assurance testing and implement corrective actions as needed.
team management:
lead and mentor a team of engineers and production staff.
foster a collaborative work environment and ensure effective communication across departments.
project management:
manage production-related projects, including new product introductions and process upgrades.
track project milestones, budgets, and resource allocation.
troubleshooting and problem solving:
address production issues and implement solutions to minimize downtime and disruptions.
collaborate with engineering teams to resolve technical challenges.
compliance and safety:
ensure compliance with industry regulations, safety standards, and environmental guidelines.
promote a culture of safety and continuous improvement within the production facility.
data analysis and reporting:
use data analytics to monitor production performance and identify trends.
prepare reports for senior management on production metrics and performance.

job description
as the senior interior designer for condominium projects at sansiri plc, you will be responsible for managing the interior design process from concept to completion. your role will involve translating the marketing team's vision into actionable design briefs for outsourced designers and ensuring that the design aligns with the project’s concept and quality standards. you will coordinate closely with various stakeholders to ensure that the design execution meets sansiri’s standards for functionality, aesthetics, and market appeal.
collaborate with the marketing team to understand the desired mood, tone, and concept for each condominium project.
develop and communicate clear design briefs to external designers that align with the project’s goals.
manage and oversee the work of outsourced interior designers, ensuring their designs are in line with sansiri’s vision and project requirements.
provide feedback and guidance to designers throughout the design process.
review and approve design proposals, materials, and finishings before final submission to ensure they meet project specifications.
work closely with internal teams, including project management, architecture, and construction, to ensure seamless integration of interior design with the overall project.
monitor the implementation of interior design on-site, addressing any issues and ensuring that the design aligns with the approved plans.
ensure that all design elements adhere to sansiri’s standards of functionality, practicality, and aesthetic appeal.
conduct regular site visits to verify that the design execution matches the approved designs and specifications.
act as the main liaison between sansiri and external design teams, ensuring effective and clear communication.
present design concepts, progress updates, and any necessary revisions to senior management and relevant stakeholders.

key responsibilities
ดำเนินการวิจัยและค้นหาโอกาสใหม่ๆ ให้กับบริษัท
พัฒนาและใช้ข้อมูลเชิงวิเคราะห์ สถิติ และการสร้างโมเดลทางธุรกิจเพื่อพัฒนาและปรับปรุงประสิทธิภาพของบริษัท
ประสานงานอย่างใกล้ชิดกับทุกฝ่าย โดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่งceo, ผู้อำนวยการฝ่ายขายและการตลาด และผู้จัดการฝ่ายปฏิบัติการ เพื่อทำความเข้าใจถึงความต้องการข้อมูลของแต่ละฝ่าย และเสนอแนวทางในการเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพข้อมูลให้กับแต่ละฝ่าย
วิเคราะห์และพัฒนากรอบการทำงานร่วมกับทุกฝ่ายเพื่อช่วยเหลือการบริหารจัดการของแต่ละฝ่ายให้บรรลุเป้าหมาย
ศึกษาการพัฒนาแบบ master plan เบื้องต้นและการใช้ประโยชน์ของพื้นที่ของโครงการที่พักผู้สูงวัย
สนับสนุนการพัฒนากลยุทธ์การขายและการตลาด รวมถึงการทำความเข้าใจและดำเนินการตามแผนปฏิบัติการ
พัฒนาโมเดลธุรกิจและศึกษาความเป็นไปได้สำหรับโครงการใหม่
จัดทำรายงานและนำเสนอผลการดำเนินงานต่อทีมผู้บริหาร
ปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับหมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชา

Company: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited
Description:
responsibilities
- prepare financial reports summarizing data from the group of company and subsidiaries for presentation to department heads/management. this includes operational performance, variance analysis, sales and cost analysis, sales and expense reporting by department, as well as supporting the preparation of annual/short-term/long-term budgets and other assigned tasks. these reports are utilized by management for decision-making processes.

additional from senior data engineer

responsibilities and key objectives
key objective:
maintains alarp risk level through asset integrity management program.
ensures the chemical treatment program for crude oil production and produced water system are properly managed.
manage the asset integrity project under supervision of the lead asset integrity and flow assurance.
asset integrity responsibilities:
develop, review and analyze pipeline integrity work program that includes technical inspection of subsea pipelines and risers, conduct mechanical & fit for service assessment, and provide required recommendation.ensure all work programs are practicable, cost effective, implemented in safe manner, and comply with government regulations, company policies, and latest industrial codes and standards.
ensure risk based inspection system for pipeline is up and running which includes analysis & management of inspection data, and anomaly management, issuing technical recommendation for the necessity of corrective actions, improvement, and repair.
implements and maintains asset integrity management (aims)programs under the supervision of the lead asset integrity and flow assurance engineer.
coordinates with an internal and external organization to achieve asset integrity key objectives, i.e.coordinate with supply chain sattahip, scm, offshore operation, support vendors, etc.
manage tendering process on technical aspect to define the most effective vender for asset integrity project.
implements and controls inspection program to achieve technical requirement and commercial goal through inspection database management system or equivalent
updates and maintains anomaly registered and recommends suitable repair, as required.ensure suitable performance measures (healthiness dashboard)and kpi system is in place and regularly updated.
capable of developing written standards/operating procedures to ensure that asset integrity term is continually optimized.
review root cause analysis and failure investigation, as required.
corrosion responsibilities
responsible for the adequacy of corrosion control of all production facilities.ensure corrosion control work program review, study and implementations follow regulations, the latest codes and standards.
facilitate the corrosion data evaluation and produce recommendations for improvement and rectification plans.
define the corrosion control and monitoring work programs such as coating selection, material selection, cp design and maintenance and work program.
lead and organized corrosion inspection campaign (include coating repair)as mitigation action for external corrosion threat.
regular review existing corrosion monitoring and control program in view of effectiveness and develop new appropriate strategy with basis fit for purpose and perform any remedial action as required.
analyze corrosion mechanism, conduct failure analysis and define the best corrosion control strategy for all the production facilities.
flow assurance responsibilities
manages the supply of production chemical to fulfill operation requirements, including day to day liaison with vendor and operation team.
performs vendor performance evaluation on regular basis, day to day trouble shooting on production chemical.
be the contract owner for annual crude oil analysis, produced water analysis, and other lab tests as required.
financial/budget responsibility:
asset integrity inspection and project would require follow-up to make sure that it will not over available budget.

understand the client’s needs, eligibility, and coverage and provide quality assistance service

provide clients with quality advice and make helpful recommendations
profile:
bachelor’s degree in any field
a first relevant experience in health insurance would be a strong plus
communication in english must be very fluid as there will be plenty of exchange with international colleagues and clients
excellent oral communication, interpersonal and analytical skills
customer-oriented, problem-solving, and multitasking
able to adapt to a fast-paced work environment
knowledge of computer pc, ms-office, internet, e-mail
what we offer:
a fun and stimulating work environment where there is space to learn and grow
the opportunity the be part of a fast-growing, entrepreneurial, and extremely dynamic company
the possibility to gain knowledge and experience in the promising sector of health insurance.

job description
with thousands of hotels in over 100 countries and territories, hilton offers countless opportunities to delight. from an open door to a welcoming smile and an exceptional experience, we offer the millions oftravellerswho stay with us every year a welcome they will never forget. in addition to our flagship brand, hilton hotels & resorts, the family of brands includes waldorf astoria, lxr, conrad, canopy, curio collection, doubletree, hilton garden inn, hampton and many others.
if you appreciate the impact global travel can have on the world, you may be just the person we are looking for to work as a hilton team member. because it’s with hilton where we never forget the reason we're here: to delight our guests, team members, and owners alike.
an assistant chief steward oversees and directs all aspects of stewarding operations under the general guidance and supervision of the chief steward, following hilton policies and procedures. this role ensures that quality standards of cleanliness, hygiene and sanitation of all kitchen areas, equipment and utensils are maintained at all times, leading to guest satisfaction, employee satisfaction and profit for the hotel.
what will i be doing?
as the assistant chief steward, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards:
focus on customer service.
resolve issues and effectively communicate with customers and colleagues.
guide steward supervisors and stewards in their jobs.
oversee the cleanliness standards for kitchen areas, banquet rooms, equipment and utensils, controlling and analyzing costs for these areas as well as costs for cleaning supplies, payroll, breakage and loss, ensuring guests and team satisfaction.
in-charge of implementing the cleaning program as scheduled and monitoring the results of the program.
be up to date with new cleaning supplies, equipment, trends and systems in stewarding.
assist the stewards during operations.
responsible for the handling and daily maintenance of all kitchen and cleaning equipment, storing safely all flatware, glassware, hollowware, utensils and related equipment.
maintain stock for cleaning supplies, chemicals and operating equipment, making requisitions when needed.
assign specific tasks to the stewarding team.
maintain and update the steward operating manual, chemical and cleaning charts for the team’s reference.
report all accidents and incidents.
conduct and prepare the monthly operating equipment inventory.
monitor operating equipment, reporting any breakage or loss in the breakage and loss report.
coordinate with the engineering department for preventive maintenance systems for exhaust, drainage, burners, fryers, refrigerator, freezers and other major equipment.
inspect all stewarding supplies and equipment received according to the established specifications.
check that all areas of the kitchen, canteen, and storerooms are of approved sanitation standards.
update and review cleaning products, purchase specifications and cleaning methods to ensure the highest possible standards at all times.
direct and check setups for buffets in the outlet and banquet functions.
provide active supervision during the implementation of cleaning schedules.
monitor the daily, weekly and monthly banquet functions, outlet promotions and activities, to plan for provision of equipment and manpower.
acquire contact from various hotels in the city to secure additional equipment for big functions and events.
knowledgeable of fire safety and security procedures in relation to the stewarding operation.
knowledgeable of all job description in stewarding section, capable of performing tasks as required.
check and maintain the sanitation level of the garbage room (wet and dry).
coordinate with finance and security in processing the disposal sale ofpig’slop.
actively seek verbal feedback from customers and team members at each service period.
be available to assist on duty in the restaurant & bars during any busy days or special events.
knowledgeable of departmental standards and able to explain the standards to team members.
assess team members’ performance against departmental standards.
describe, assign and delegate duties and authority for the operation of the stewarding team at all times.
plan ahead and ensure adequate resources are available.
coordinate with the engineering and housekeeping departments to ensure maintenance and cleanliness, ensuring that follow-up procedures are maintained.
ensure that the shift is reviewed, and handovers and briefings are carried out.
establish good communication with the kitchen team.
get members of the team to work cooperatively with others.
keep the team up to date about departmental, hotel, company activities, special events and restaurant promotions through regular communication meetings and memos.
assist with selecting, training, coaching and developing team members to meet current and future needs of the department and the hotel.
ensure the health, safety and well-being of customers and all team members.
the management reserves the right to make changes to this job description at its sole discretion and without advance notice.
carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
what are we looking for?
an assistant chief steward serving hilton brands is always working on behalf of our guests and working with other team members. to successfully fill this role, you should maintain the attitude,behaviours, skills, and values that follow:
high school diploma equivalent or above.
at least 5 years of working experience in a 5-star category hotel.
at least 2 years as a stewarding supervisor in an international brand hotel.
possess a validhealthcertificate.
knowledgeable of team member training and motivation procedures.
able to set priorities and complete tasks in a timely manner.
work well in stressful situations, remain calm under pressure and able to solve problems.
able to work in a moist, hot and sometimes loud environment.
guide and direct the stewarding team to perform at the best level in terms of quality, hygiene and profitability.
flexible, responds quickly and positively to changing requirements including the performance of any tasks requested of you.
maintain high team focus by showing co-operation and support to colleagues in the pursuit of team goals.
motivated and committed, approaching all tasks with enthusiasm and seizing opportunities to learn new skills or knowledge in order to improve personal performance.
familiar with computer systems.
knowledge in haccp.
good command in english, both verbal and written to meet business needs, preferred.
working experience within hilton group advantageous.
what will it be like to work for hilton?
hilton is the leading global hospitality company, spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels. for nearly a century, hilton has offered business and leisuretravellersthe finest in accommodations, service, amenities and value. hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands. our vision to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day. and, our amazing team members are at the heart of it all!
