job description
at thermo fisher scientific, our finance teams are important to our business and functional teams to make educated, sound decisions that drive our mission and make us a stable and trusted industry leader. from financial planning & analysis, tax, treasury, financial reporting, audit, investor relations, strategy & corporate development to accounting, our finance functions have a diverse and global presence, providing significant opportunities to develop outstanding career experiences and perspectives. ranked #95 on the 2021 fortune 500 list and with revenues of more than $40 billion, you’ll discover endless opportunities to grow a rewarding career as part of the world leader serving science.
southeast asia and taiwan as a growth engine for the company, has over 3000 employees, supporting 21 divisions or businesses across all functions from commercial to manufacturing, r&d and supply chain.
job description
reporting to southeast asia and taiwan finance senior director and business partnering with country commercial lead, you will provide commercial finance insights for the country and drive sustainable and profitable growth. you will be the finance partner in optimizing working capital levels while ensuring overall credit risks, receivables and debtors functions are managed appropriately. you will also be responsible improving processes, playing leadership role in change management, developing and implementing business intelligence tools.
key role and responsibilities
commercial finance / business partner
provide day-to-day finance leadership for fp&a and business partnership for the division’s operating teams to drive business performance
provide strategic guidance to business partners to capitalize on opportunities
demonstrate world class partnership to operating partners including managing and forecasting operating expense and capital spend
drive monthly forecasting, annual operating plan and future planning (aop / strap), quarterly business reviews (qbr), in a matrixed environment, ensuring financial decisions support company goals and current market conditions.
lead pricing and commercial terms analysis for new and existing business
lead monthly commercial channel management reviews highlighting trending and funnel performance, won-loss analysis and existing customer performance
develop and lead analytical methods for exploratory and explanatory business insights
control and risk management
continuously establishing, updating, improving and implementing compliance-related internal control system and sops, ensure thermo fisher’s compliance requirements being carried through the company, the employees, and external business partners, e.g. distributors, dealers and vendors
provide support and advice on compliance related matters. monitor and test behavior of employee and external business partners against company integrity rules and report findings to business leadership.
perform risk assessment of 3rd party intermediaries and develop recommendations to minimize their risk to the business.
support management to define and implement improvement strategy and actions regarding revealed compliance issue (supervising result, process gap, investigation result follow up).
support different compliance projects. handle the implementation of compliance programs.
communicate compliance rules to employees, external business partners and educate them on how to apply these rules. ensure all employees are adequately aware and trained on thermo fisher business ethics, policies and procedures. build and maintain a culture of integrity.
tax & audit
prepares or coordinates replies to tax authority audits, working with various departments to collate the information required and ensuring the reply is appropriate to the queries raised.
reviews tax accounting quarterly tax packs prepared by local accountants and prepares tax accounting quarterly packs for certain complex assigned entities.
provides reports to management on status of corporate tax compliance.
supports tax accounting and manages/ participates in project work.
provide support to internal and external audits.
